com.camerontec.catalys.server.souptcp.packet

Class LoginRejectedPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.souptcp.packet.SoupPacket
      • com.camerontec.catalys.server.souptcp.packet.LoginRejectedPacket
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Soup20LoginRejectedPacket, Soup30LoginRejectedPacket

    public abstract class LoginRejectedPacket
extends SoupPacket
    The SoupTCP server sends this packet in response to an invalid Login Request Packet from the client. The server closes the socket connection after sending the Login Reject Packet. The Login Rejected Packet will be the only non-debug packet sent by the server in the case of an unsuccessful login attempt.

        public AlphaNumericField getRejectReason()
        Reason of the login rejection.

        Returns:
        "A" - Invalid username/password, "S" - Session unavalable/Invalid session ID
